channel.title: Jaghax.com OWNER Scammer / DDoSer
channel.description:
The following pictures are evidence that Jaghax.com owner ( a gay runescape cheathing communitie in my opinnion that is getting popular and decreasing members at the same time ), is a scammer, the idividuals name is Outrage a owner - co-owner along with w12ath ( another one.. ),
The following pictures shows how Outrage pretends to be a different person becouse his plan messed up becouse i caught him. What did i exactly caught him doing? He was going to pretend his msn got hacked and scam people and send them viruses, after he hacked and scammed, he would post in jaghax.com forum announcement that he got hacked, the following pics show that the format, pictures, and text color are the same and he was online the whole time the actions occoured .Althought Outrage ( Jaghax.com owner ), was trying to scam, he was trying to ddos another runescape communitie called Rs2underground.com, convincing people to teach him how to hack.
---- The reason im posting this, i dont want people get scammed --
http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/7697/newbitmapimage3mg6.png http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/21/newbitmapimage2dv4.png http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/21/newbitmapimage2dv4.png http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/7325/newbitmapimage4yq9.png http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/8457/newbitmapimage5zq0.png http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/4325/newbitmapimage6gm0.png http://img265.imageshack.us/img265/3258/newbitmapimage7iv3.png
Making This Communitie a safer place to be.
